渟字的基本解释

渟
tíng
水积聚而不流动：“禹凿龙门，通大夏，疏九河，曲九防，决渟水，致之海。”
（水）深：崇渟。

渟
tīng
古同“汀”，水边平地。

渟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tíng］
［《廣韻》特丁切，平青，定。］
(1)水聚集不流。
(2)泛指停聚。
(3)深。

渟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　渟； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页633第47
【廣韻】特丁切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】唐丁切，?音庭。【埤蒼】渟，水止也。【史記·李斯傳】決渟水致之海。或作亭。【前漢·西域傳】其水亭居。　又與停同。【後漢·趙岐傳】渟車呼與共載。　又【集韻】湯丁切，音廳。與汀同。水際平地也。

渟字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
渟字的起名意思

：指深；水明静清澈的。

stagnant water
Basic explanation of words
stagnant water
tíng
Water accumulates but does not flow: "Yu cuts through the dragon gate, opens the Great Xia, dredges the Jiuhe, Qu Jiufang, determines the water, to the sea."
(Water) Deep: Chongming.
stagnant water
tīng
In ancient times, the "Ting" is flat on the water's edge.
stagnant water
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tíng］
["Guangyun" special Dingqie, Pingqing, Ding. ]
(1) Water gathers but does not flow.
(2) Generally refers to stop gathering.
(3) Deep.
stagnant water
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　渟; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 633 47
[Guang Yun] Te Ding Qi [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme] Tang Ding Qi,? Yin Ting. 【Picang】Hey, the water stops. 【Historical Records·Li Si Chuan】Judging the water to the sea. Or as a pavilion. [Previous Han·Western Biography] Its water pavilion residence.　The same with Ting again. [Later Han·Zhao Qi Biography] The car is called and shared.　[Jiyun] Tang Ding Cut, Sound Hall. Same as Ting. The water level is also flat.
stagnant water

Old glyph

Name meaning
: Means deep; the water is clear and quiet.
tíng
I сущ.
стоячая вода; стоячий, несточный
渟泉 родник без стока
II гл.
1) останавливаться; стоять, застаиваться (о воде)
水渟 вода застоялась
2) вм. 停 (останавливать)
